question.questiondesc: Have you used at least one household product (e.g. dishwasher detergent) at least once during the last 3 months?
Is there a barcode on the product that you chose?
question.subtitle: This question is about all houshold products used. Prepare the products before scanning

question.questiondesc: Enter the product name.
Scan the product's barcode
For which part of your house have you used it?

choices.choice: I rinse my hands after usage
I dilute it in water before using it
I do not dilute it in water, before using it
